features.name: False Appearance
features.description: While the shrieker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

actions.name: Shriek
actions.description: When bright light or a creature is within 30 feet of the shrieker, it emits a shriek audible within 300 feet of it. The shrieker continues to shriek until the disturbance moves out of range and for 1d4 of the shrieker's turns afterward
